name: dingy

dark and often also dirty: a dingy room/corridor Her hair was a dingy brown colour.

with little or no lightdarkShe peered down the dark hallway.darkenedWe arrived late and had to make our way to our seats in a darkened theatre.dimHe sat in a dim corner of the waiting room.shadowyI was afraid to walk down the dim, shadowy corridor.pitch blackIt was pitch black on our street after the power outage.

(of a place or material) dark and unattractive esp. because of being dirty or not cared for: The stores seemed old and dingy, their lights too dim and their ceilings too low.
